title: DynoMol
description: A molecular dynamics programm writen from scratch. Simulates the movements the internal structures of simple hydrocarbons

slides.description: Dynamol is a molecular mechanics program with the main function of finding the lowest energy configurations carbohydrate molecules
The program enables the tracking of the energies during the atoms movements through the molecules configurationchange
Dynamol is a terminal tool and allows the user to adjust simulation paramaters such a stepsize and number
The Newton rapson method is used, approximating the atoms as classical bodies simulating their mothements by calculating the forces on each atom
While simulating the internal movements the lowest energy configuration is saved and output as the optimal shape

title: QLHunter
description: A Cyber Security Tool for manual pentesting of graphql apis

slides.description: QLHunter is a cyber security tool used to automize recon and manual testing of graphql endpoints
Automatic subdomain enumeration aswell as graphql endpoint fuzzing
Enables easy Introspection and schema vizualization
Utilizing inbuild external tools for port scanning and technology fingerprinting

title: Chess Interface
description: This one speaks for itself. I wanted to chalange myself and create a chess Interface and programm the game logic with no external modules
